description:
Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Handsome Jack Doppelganger Pack is an action game. It was originally released in 2014. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Handsome Jack Doppelganger Pack is available on PC.
